title: Moz News - MozMoz logoMenu openMenu closeSearchMoz logo
description: Your all-in-one suite of SEO essentials.
content: By: Susan Sestak December 24, 2013 Moz Holiday Traditions Moz News ​Here at Moz, we often feel like a big family. Just like any other family, over the years we've developed an eclectic set of traditions to celebrate the holiday season. We'd like to share a few of our favorites and welcome you to join us in these most joyous of festivities. ;) Read this post By: Trevor Klein December 17, 2013 All About You: Results of the Moz Blog Survey Moz News Last month, 766 of our readers took a few minutes to tell us what they thought of the Moz Blog. We were absolutely blown away by the quality of the feedback we got, and we're excited to share what we learned with all of you. Read this post By: Erica McGillivray November 12, 2013 The 2013 #MozCon Video Bundle is Live! Moz News The 2013 #MozCon Video Bundle is here. Enjoy 37 talks (over 19 hours) from inbound marketing experts! Read this post By: Jennifer Sable Lopez November 11, 2013 Last Chance! Take the 2013 Industry Survey #ShareYourVoice Moz News You have one more week to jump in and take the 2013 Moz Industry Survey. Take this chance to share your voice, and don't forget the killer prizes! But don't just take the survey, share it with your friends! Read this post By: Matthew Brown October 15, 2013 A Field Guide to Moz Analytics Moz News Announcing Moz Analytics, the platform that enables marketers to track all their marketing data in one place. Read this post By: Cyrus Shepard October 2, 2013 The Future of Search: 2013 Search Engine Ranking Factors Released Moz News | Advanced SEO Every 2 years, Moz surveys over 100 top industry professionals to compile our biennial Search Engine Ranking Factors. For 2013 we’ve supplemented the survey with real-world correlation data from scientifically examining of over 17,000 keyword search results. We've released some of the 2013 data previously, but not the full set until now. So with great pleasure, I present the complete results of this year's survey and correlation data. Read this post By: Anthony Skinner September 26, 2013 On Our Wait-List? You Get a Moz Analytics! Moz News It's official: We've begun releasing Moz Analytics to the people who signed up to be on the wait-list! Here are all the details from Moz's CTO, Anthony Skinner. Read this post By: Nick Sayers July 30, 2013 Announcing Moz Academy! Moz News Announcing Moz Academy, the one-stop resource for inbound marketers! This is the classroom where you can learn all about SEO, link-earning, social media, and content marketing. Each lesson is short and to-the-point. Read this post By: Ruth Burr Reedy July 3, 2013 Domain Migrations: Surviving the "Perfect Storm" of Site Changes Moz News Last week, I held a Mozinar talking about the SEO steps involved in transitioning from SEOmoz.org to Moz.com, and sharing some of the results we got. We got some great questions on the Mozinar, and I wanted a chance to answer some more of them as well as expand on some points that didn’t fit into the Mozinar. Read this post By: Rand Fishkin May 29, 2013 Goodbye SEOmoz. Hello Moz! Moz News For the last two years, the 130+ Mozzers across product, engineering, marketing, and operations have been working to transform this company to the next stage of our evolution. Today, that incredibly demanding, intense, but ultimately rewarding process has reached its first goal. I'm excited to announce that as of today, SEOmoz is formally transitioning our brand, our products, our company name, and all of our efforts to Moz. Read this post By: Erica McGillivray May 6, 2013 We Want You to Speak at #MozCon 2013 Moz News Last year's MozCon Community Speakers were a hit, and we're doing it again. Now's the time to toss your hat in the ring! Read this post By: Nick Sayers April 1, 2013 Introducing Moz Reader! Moz News Are you still struggling with the demise of Google Reader? Have no fear! SEOmoz is happy to bring you the Moz Reader. Read this post By: Derric Wise March 6, 2013 The Evolution of Roger Moz News Ever wonder how our favorite robot came to life? In today's post, Derric Wise walks us through the evolution of Roger throughout the years. From his first "crawls" to his current state, dive into the creative minds behind Roger Mozbot! Read this post By: Rand Fishkin January 23, 2013 Announcing Moz's 2012 Metrics, Acquisition of AudienceWise, & Opening of Our Portland Office Moz News 2012 was an amazing year at SEOmoz. We grew tremendously in members, revenue, and employees; finally raised a second round of funding; added a number of great features to our product; and acquired three companies. Today, we're thrilled to officially announce our third acquisition and the opening of our Portland office, as well as release our 2012 financials and growth data! Read this post
